channel.title: Prank your friends :D [tut]
channel.description:
[center]I found this awesome batch file to prank your friends with; also works with moms
[b]note: This is completely harmless, to close use ALT+F4[/b]
[b]Download for if you are to lazy to make it yourself[/b] ^^ [b]:[/b] [url=http://up.ht/tqxC3b]http://up.ht/tqxC3b[/url][/center]
[b]If u want to make it yourself:[/b] 1. Right click on your desktop and open a new text file. 2. Give it a name so your friends are willing to open it 3. Paste this code in it: [code] @echo off
( echo ^<html^>^<head^>^<title^>Microsoft Windows^</title^> echo. echo ^<hta:application id="oBVC" echo applicationname="BSOD" echo version="1.0" echo maximizebutton="no" echo minimizebutton="no" echo sysmenu="no" echo Caption="no" echo windowstate="maximize"/^> echo. echo ^</head^>^<body bgcolor="#000088" scroll="no"^> echo ^<font face="Lucida Console" size="4" color="white"^> echo ^<p^>A problem has been detected and windows has been shutdown to prevent damage to your computer.^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LES_OR_EQUAL^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>If this is the first time you've seen this stop error screen, restart your computer, If this screen appears again, follow these steps:^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>Check to make sure any new hardware or software is properly installed. If this is a new installation, ask your hardware or software manufacturer for any windows updates you might need.^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>If problems continue, disable or remove any newly installed hardware or software. Disable BIOS memory options such as caching or shadowing. If you need to use Safe Mode to remove or disable components, restart your computer, press F8 to select Advanced Startup Options, and then select Safe Mode.^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>Technical information:^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>*** STOP: 0x00D1 ^(0x00C,0x002,0x00,0xF86B5A89^)^</p^> echo. echo. echo ^<p^>*** gv3.sys - Address F86B5A89 base at F86B5000, DateStamp 3dd9919eb^</p^> echo. echo ^<p^>Beginning dump of physical memory^</p^> echo ^<p^>Physical memory dump complete.^</p^> echo ^<p^>Contact your system administrator or technical support group for further assistance.^</p^> echo. echo. echo ^</font^> echo ^</body^> echo. echo ^<script language="javascript"^> echo function noClick^(^) { echo if ^(^(event.button==1^)^|^|^(event.button==2^)^) { echo alert^('Error: 00101100x00100100 missing keymgr.dll'^) echo } echo } echo document.onmousedown=noClick echo ^</script^> echo. echo ^</html^> ) > bsod.hta
start "" /wait "bsod.hta"
del /f /q "bsod.hta" > nul [/code] 4. Save as batch file [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/5462/tttcs.jpg[/img]
5. Run it yourself and laugh (don't panick, press ALT+F4 to close) 6. Send to your friends :D
[b]What happens when u run the batch.[/b] - It creates a HTML-file (invisible) - Then displays the blue screen of death - sadly enough it has a small border and u see your mouse but it's enough to scare the shit out of people. - When closing the created file automatically deletes to.
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/9657/lollod.jpg[/img]
Credits: iGnite
[center][b]HAVE FUN (:[/b][/center]

item.title: Prank your friends :D [tut]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[center]I found this awesome batch file to prank your friends with; also works with moms

note: This is completely harmless, to close use ALT+F4

Download for if you are to lazy to make it yourself ^^ : http://up.ht/tqxC3b[/center]

If u want to make it yourself:

  1. Right click on your desktop and open a new text file.
  2. Give it a name so your friends are willing to open it
  3. Paste this code in it:
@echo off

 (
 echo ^<html^>^<head^>^<title^>Microsoft Windows^</title^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<hta:application id="oBVC" 
 echo applicationname="BSOD"  
 echo version="1.0" 
 echo maximizebutton="no" 
 echo minimizebutton="no" 
 echo sysmenu="no" 
 echo Caption="no" 
 echo windowstate="maximize"/^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^</head^>^<body bgcolor="#000088" scroll="no"^> 
 echo ^<font face="Lucida Console" size="4" color="white"^> 
 echo ^<p^>A problem has been detected and windows has been shutdown to prevent damage to your computer.^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LES_OR_EQUAL^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>If this is the first time you've seen this stop error screen, restart your computer, If this screen appears again, follow these steps:^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>Check to make sure any new hardware or software is properly installed. If this is a new installation, ask your hardware or software manufacturer for any windows updates you might need.^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>If problems continue, disable or remove any newly installed hardware or software. Disable BIOS memory options such as caching or shadowing. If you need to use Safe Mode to remove or disable components, restart your computer, press F8 to select Advanced Startup Options, and then select Safe Mode.^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>Technical information:^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>*** STOP: 0x00D1 ^(0x00C,0x002,0x00,0xF86B5A89^)^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>***  gv3.sys - Address F86B5A89 base at F86B5000, DateStamp 3dd9919eb^</p^> 
 echo. 
 echo ^<p^>Beginning dump of physical memory^</p^> 
 echo ^<p^>Physical memory dump complete.^</p^> 
 echo ^<p^>Contact your system administrator or technical support group for further assistance.^</p^> 
 echo.
 echo. 
 echo ^</font^> 
 echo ^</body^>
 echo.
 echo ^<script language="javascript"^>
 echo function noClick^(^) {
 echo if ^(^(event.button==1^)^|^|^(event.button==2^)^) {
 echo alert^('Error: 00101100x00100100 missing keymgr.dll'^)
 echo }
 echo }
 echo document.onmousedown=noClick
 echo ^</script^>
 echo.  
 echo ^</html^> 
 ) > bsod.hta 

 start "" /wait "bsod.hta"

 del /f /q "bsod.hta" > nul

  1. Save as batch file

  2. Run it yourself and laugh (don’t panick, press ALT+F4 to close)

  3. Send to your friends

What happens when u run the batch.

  • It creates a HTML-file (invisible)
  • Then displays the blue screen of death
  • sadly enough it has a small border and u see your mouse but it’s enough to scare the shit out of people.
  • When closing the created file automatically deletes to.

Media:

Credits: iGnite

[center]HAVE FUN (:[/center]

Read full topic
